Name: Deep Space Shooter
About the game: An automatic station deep in the space has sent an alarm signal and then the connection disrupted. Your spaceship set off there to carry out reconnaissance. But all of a sudden you encounter huge forces of an unknown enemy. Now there’s no way back –you either defeat him or die. This game is a vertical scroll-shooter with numerous enemies and a gradually increasing level of complexity. Game feature: 24 original levels eight-bit music 12 bosses an endless level mode with strong enemies
